EnableWeatherMasking.Name: Enable Indoor Weather Masking
EnableWeatherMasking.Hint: When enabled, FXMaster weather effects will be masked inside Drawings marked as 'Is Indoor Zone'.

EnableMovementPenalties.Name: Enable Weather Movement Penalties
EnableMovementPenalties.Hint: When enabled, movement speed will be automatically reduced for tokens outdoors based on current weather.

CurrentWeather.Name: Current World Weather
CurrentWeather.Hint: Sets the current global weather condition for the scene. Affects FXMaster and movement penalties.

LightRainSpeedPenalty.Name: Light Rain Speed Penalty (ft)
LightRainSpeedPenalty.Hint: The amount of movement speed (in feet) to reduce for tokens in light rain. Set to 0 for no penalty. (PF2e: typically no penalty, but customizable)

HeavyRainSpeedPenalty.Name: Heavy Rain Speed Penalty (ft)
HeavyRainSpeedPenalty.Hint: The amount of movement speed (in feet) to reduce for tokens in heavy rain. Set to 0 for no penalty. (PF2e: often difficult terrain)

SnowSpeedPenalty.Name: Snow Speed Penalty (ft)
SnowSpeedPenalty.Hint: The amount of movement speed (in feet) to reduce for tokens in snow. Set to 0 for no penalty. (PF2e: often difficult terrain)

BlizzardSpeedPenalty.Name: Blizzard Speed Penalty (ft)
BlizzardSpeedPenalty.Hint: The amount of movement speed (in feet) to reduce for tokens in a blizzard. Set to 0 for no penalty. (PF2e: severe difficult terrain)

IsIndoorZone.Name: Is Indoor Zone?
IsIndoorZone.Hint: Mark this drawing as an indoor area to mask weather effects within it.

Notifications.FXMasterNotActive: FXMaster module is not active. Please enable it for full functionality.
